mapper.select: SELECT t.tour_name tourName, t.tour_num tourNum, c.check_num checkNum FROM tour t LEFT OUTER JOIN `check` c ON c.tour_num = t.tour_num
SELECT * FROM tour t LEFT OUTER JOIN img_detail id ON id.tour_num = t.tour_num LEFT OUTER JOIN img ig ON ig.img_num = id.img_num WHERE t.tour_num = #{tourNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tour (tour_num,tour_name, tour_addr, tour_content, tour_site_addr, tour_img1_path) VALUES (#{tour_num}, #{tour_name}, #{tour_addr}, #{tour_content}, #{tour_site_addr}, #{tour_img1_path})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.user_name userName, u.user_pass userPass, u.user_tel userTel, u.user_email userEmail, u.user_addr userAddr, u.user_gender userGender, u.user_age userAge, u.user_prefer_type1 userPreferType1 , u.user_prefer_type2 userPreferType2 , u.user_prefer_type3 userPreferType3, u.user_prefer_loc1 userPreferLoc1, u.user_prefer_loc2 userPreferLoc2 , u.user_prefer_loc3 userPreferLoc3, u.admin_authority adminAuthority , u.user_login_authority userLoginAuthority, u.user_register_date userRegisterDate, u.user_delete_date userDeleteDate, i.img_real_name imgRealName FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN `img_detail` imgde ON u.user_id = imgde.user_id LEFT JOIN `img` i ON imgde.img_num = i.img_num;

SELECT tvw.user_id user_id , tvw.touroview_content touroview_content, li.like_count like_count, rp.report_count report_count, tvw.touroview_regdate touroview_regdate, tvw.touroview_update touroview_update ,tvw.touroview_title ,tr.tour_name tour_name ,tvw.touroview_num touroview_num FROM touroview tvw LEFT JOIN `like` li ON li.touroview_num = tvw.touroview_num LEFT JOIN `report` rp ON rp.touroview_num = tvw.touroview_num LEFT JOIN `tour` tr ON tr.tour_num = tvw.tour_num

SELECT * FROM touroview tvw LEFT OUTER JOIN img_detail id ON id.touroview_num = tvw.touroview_num LEFT OUTER JOIN img ig ON ig.img_num = id.img_num LEFT OUTER JOIN tour tr ON tr.tour_num = tvw.tour_num WHERE tvw.touroview_num = #{touroview_num}

SELECT tvw.user_id user_id, tvw.touroview_content touroview_content, li.like_count like_count, rp.report_count report_count, tvw.touroview_regdate touroview_regdate, tvw.touroview_update touroview_update, tvw.touroview_title touroview_title, tr.tour_name tour_name, tvw.touroview_num touroview_num FROM touroview tvw LEFT JOIN `like` li ON li.touroview_num = tvw.touroview_num LEFT JOIN `report` rp ON rp.touroview_num = tvw.touroview_num LEFT JOIN `tour` tr ON tr.tour_num = tvw.tour_num WHERE tvw.touroview_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{touroview_title}, '%') OR tr.tour_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tour_name}, '%') OR tvw.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user_id}, '%') OR tvw.touroview_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{touroview_content}, '%')
SELECT * FROM `tour` ORDER BY tour_star DESC LIMIT 6;

SELECT tvw.touroview_num touroview_num , tvw.user_id user_id, tvw.tour_num tour_num, tvw.touroview_content touroview_content, l.like_count like_count , t.tour_name tour_name, t.tour_num tour_num, t.tour_star tour_star, t.tour_img1_path tour_img1_path, t.tour_img2_path tour_img2_path, SUBSTRING(tvw.touroview_title, 1, 3) AS touroview_title, SUBSTRING(t.tour_content, 1, 10) AS tour_content FROM touroview tvw LEFT OUTER JOIN `like` l ON l.touroview_num = tvw.touroview_num LEFT OUTER JOIN `tour` t ON tvw.tour_num = t.tour_num ORDER BY l.like_count DESC LIMIT 4
